name: SendVendorPaymentEmail
description:
Send a payment receipt email to a vendor.

This tool sends a vendor payment receipt to a vendor via email. You can customize the email content, attach files, and control sender preferences. If no customizations are provided, the email will use default templates.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: ID of the organization for which the vendor payment email is being sent.

parameters.name: vendor_payment_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the vendor payment. Used to retrieve and send the corresponding payment receipt via email.

parameters.name: email_attachments
parameters.description: List of file paths or URLs to attach to the email.

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

parameters.name: attached_file_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file to be attached to the email.

value_schema.description: Name of the file to be attached

parameters.name: email_customization
parameters.description: JSON object to customize email content, such as sender info, recipients, subject, and body. Use default settings if none provided.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be CC'd.

email_template_id.description: Get the email content based on a specific email template. If this param is not inputted, then the content will be based on the email template associated with the vendor. If no template is associated with the vendor, then default template will be used.

parameters.name: send_vendor_payment_attachment
parameters.description: Set to true to include the vendor payment attachment in the email.

value_schema.description: Send the vendor payment attachment with the email.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: send_attachment
parameters.description: Send the vendor payment attachment with the email.

value_schema.description: Send the vendor payment attachment with the email.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Files to be attached to the email

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Name of the file to be attached

value_schema.description: Name of the file to be attached
